Package connect4

Class Grid

java.lang.Object
connect4.Grid
Direct Known Subclasses:
Game
public class Grid
extends java.lang.Object
Stores game data and defines game operations that happen on the game board(not board panel)
Version:
May, 2025
Author:
alexj0523

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    char[][] grid
    2d array grid (x,y components)

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Grid​(int x, int y)
    Constructor that creates 2d array grid with the size x x y

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void clearGrid()
    Resets grid
    int drop​(char c, int posX)
    Method that finds the lowest position of given column and fills in that position with c(color).
    boolean isFull()
    returns whether or not the entire grid is full
    boolean isLegal​(int posX)
    Returns if the player can place a chip in the given column
    char isWin​(int posX, int posY)
    Method that determines if there's a winner or not by checking all 8 directions and returns the color of the winner
    void undoDrop​(int posX)
    Removing the chip in the highest position that is occupied of the given column

  • Field Details

    • grid

      public char[][] grid
      2d array grid (x,y components)

  • Constructor Details

    • Grid

      public Grid​(int x, int y)
      Constructor that creates 2d array grid with the size x x y
      Parameters:
      x - width(number of columns)
      y - height(number of rows)

  • Method Details

    • drop

      public int drop​(char c, int posX)
      Method that finds the lowest position of given column and fills in that position with c(color).
      Parameters:
      c - color of the chip
      posX - x coordinate of the position (Column)
      Returns:
      y coordinate of the valid position (the lowest remaining). If full, return -1.

    • clearGrid

      public void clearGrid()
      Resets grid

    • isFull

      public boolean isFull()
      returns whether or not the entire grid is full
      Returns:
      true if the grid is full, false if there's empty space(s)

    • isLegal

      public boolean isLegal​(int posX)
      Returns if the player can place a chip in the given column
      Parameters:
      posX - given column
      Returns:
      true if there's empty space in the column, false if not

    • undoDrop

      public void undoDrop​(int posX)
      Removing the chip in the highest position that is occupied of the given column
      Parameters:
      posX - given column

    • isWin

      public char isWin​(int posX, int posY)
      Method that determines if there's a winner or not by checking all 8 directions and returns the color of the winner
      Parameters:
      posX - current chip's x component
      posY - current chip's y component
      Returns:
      color of the winner or blank if there's no winner
